## Separando dois trechos da serie


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tsibble)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```

Attaching package: 'tsibble'
```
:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
The following objects are masked from 'package:base':

    intersect, setdiff, union
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
library(feasts)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
Carregando pacotes exigidos: fabletools
```
:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```

Attaching package: 'fabletools'
```
:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
The following objects are masked from 'package:forecast':

    accuracy, forecast
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
ausbeer2 <- as_tsibble(ausbeer)
serie1 <- ausbeer2 %>% filter_index("1960 Q1" ~ "1964 Q4")
gg_season(serie1)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
Plot variable not specified, automatically selected `y = value`
```
:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula03_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-1.png){width=80%}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
gg_subseries(serie1)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
Plot variable not specified, automatically selected `y = value`
```
:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula03_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-2.png){width=80%}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
serie2 <- ausbeer2 %>% filter_index("2005 Q1" ~ "2009 Q4")
gg_season(serie2)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```

```
:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula03_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-3.png){width=80%}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
gg_subseries(serie2)
```
